XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <Map Prefix="/form" Forward="Form.REST.Form"/>
<Route Url="/logout" Method="GET" Call="logout"/> <Route Url="/test" Method="GET" Call="test"/> <Route Url="/info" Method="GET" Call="info"/> </Routes>

Method.name: logout
Method.Implementation: #dim %session As %CSP.Session set st = %session.Logout(1) set %session.EndSession = 1 return st

Method.name: info
Method.Implementation: set info = {} set info.languages = ##class(Form.Util.Translate).getLanguages() write info.%ToJSON() quit $$$OK
